meanings.definition: Taking everything into account; considering everything.
meanings.sent1: Overall, she did well on the test.
meanings.sent2: He looked at the overall picture before making a decision.
meanings.sent3: The cat overall thought it was a good idea to chase the laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The overall effect of the music was calming and soothing.
meanings.sent5: The overall feeling in the room was one of excitement and anticipation.

meanings.sent1: The overall cost of the project was within budget.
meanings.sent2: She was pleased with the overall performance of the team.
meanings.sent3: The overall plan was to have a picnic in the park, but it started raining.
meanings.sent4: The overall impact of the new policy was positive for the community.
meanings.sent5: The overall appearance of the house was charming and welcoming.

meanings.definition: A piece of clothing worn over other clothes.
meanings.sent1: He put on his overalls before heading out to work in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic wore his overalls to protect his clothes.
meanings.sent3: The overalls were too big for her, making her look like a little kid playing dress-up.
meanings.sent4: She tied the sleeves of her overalls around her waist as a makeshift belt.
meanings.sent5: The farmer's overalls were covered in patches from years of hard work.
